basic_info.description: I am currently working on front and back end development, with an interest in accessible programming. My interest in coding was sparked by my love for mathematics and problem-solving. I am determined to create applications that are not only beautiful but also inclusive and accessible to all. My dream is to create mobile leisure games that make people happy, ones that anyone can play and feel successful. I believe my creativity as an artist and my expertise as a math teacher will blend seamlessly into a fulfilling career in software development.

projects.title: Animal Creature Quiz & Positivity Generator
projects.description: A vanilla javascript quiz designed to give the user a result after they hit submit. It determines what kind of artist creature you might be depending on your personality. The Positivity Generator randomly generates the affirmation, font style, and colors of the font and background. One can adjust each part to make it more appealing. This was my entry test-in project for Intermediate Software Development.

projects.title: Gallery of Horns
projects.description: React-Bootstrap project for Intermediate Software Development. Users can look at various horned beasts, filter between the number of horns, and enlarge images in a modal.

projects.title: Terminal Projects
projects.description: My first projects in Javascript using the terminal. I've learned a lot since then!
